trends: There has been one other sighting in Strathmore
There were no other sightings in Strathmore on or around October 31st 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsMy husband went to the store are 6:55 PM he called me right away to tell me to outside to look at the lights. I could not see them, he told me to walk down toward the edge of the driveway and I saw a bright light. It was very bright. My husband told me to call someone, so I contacted MUFON and left a message. He was so frightened he asked me to call the Air Force, but I couldn���t find a phone number. I watched it and took video of it and so did he. Then he came home, and his boss called him on Ranch 4 to go meet him. I answered the phone. I asked our boss to look outside to see the UFO, he said it looked like a planet or something he was not sure. I hung up the phone while my husband was going to going met him his boss. While my husband was gone I was outside looking up and the object moved from the driveway side to my front door side. I was getting very upset, because he was still at ranch 4 with his boss, so I called the fire department, but they said they did not see it. The fire department is far from us, so maybe they did not, but I think they were scared. What did you think the object was when you first noticed it? A UFO. Describe the object and its actions and motions in detail. It kept moving from the side of the driveway to the front door. It did this 4 times and then vanished. It was back and forth from 7:00pm until 8:45pm. I starting getting panicky when my Turkeys fluffed up, and the chickens started clucking, and the Lamb seemed dazed. Describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object. I have seen UFO���s a lot as I have previously reported off and on for the last 18 years, but this time was different. I really was frightened, and I still am a tad. How did you lose sight of the object? It disappeared just like that. As I am uploading the pictures and videos from both cell-phone, my husband being on Ranch 4 and I being on Ranch 3 both have identical pictures and videos.
Summary: It upset my husband and I so much we call MUFON, because I have made a report before, and the fire department, also neighbors.
